name: Hasher
desc: The universal hash function used by Set and Dictionary.

items.name: func combine<H>(H)
items.desc: Adds the given value to this hasher, mixing its essential parts into the hasher state.

items.name: func combine(bytes: UnsafeRawBufferPointer)
items.desc: Adds the contents of the given buffer to this hasher, mixing it into the hasher state.

items.name: func finalize() -> Int
items.desc: Finalizes the hasher state and returns the hash value.
